mapper.select: select test_paper.id,test_paper.name,test_paper.createTime,teacher.name "tname" from test_paper inner join teacher where test_paper.postTeacherId=teacher.id;

update test_paper
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
schoolId = #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
majorId = #{majorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
semester = #{semester,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

totalScore = #{totalScore,jdbcType=REAL},
passScore = #{passScore,jdbcType=REAL},
queTypes = #{queTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
isTemplate = #{isTemplate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dot = #{dot,jdbcType=REAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
